outputs.output_descr: The project will reinforce the capacity of selected CSOs at the national and local level to obtain concrete results within the framework of national development plans and the MDGs and will aim at strengthening the partnership between Government and CSOs. The project will promote appropriate methodologies for the mobilisation and management of volunteers for development activities, especially youth and women. Finally the project will support a number of pilot activities at the local level in order to promote (and learn from) innovative approaches to the contribution of CSOs and volunteerism to the attainment of the MDGs.

project_descr: Reinforcement of the capacity and coordination mechanisms of CSOs to attain the MDGs
